title: Cyclist Magazine Podcast Episode 26 - Mr Craig Calfee
content:
Cyclist magazine
1 Apr 2021

Joe and James sit down with Craig Calfee, one of the most innovative bike builders of all time

Last month we gave you Greg LeMond. Today, the Cyclist Magazine Podcast centres around the man who made his bikes, Mr Craig Calfee.

The first bike manufacturer to have a full carbon fibre bike raced at the Tour de France, Calfee has always been a man who is ahead of the curve. Listen as Joe and James delve into Calfee's intriguing life of building bikes, where the bike industry should be heading for better performance and how bikes can make a more sustainable world.

Here is the bus that Joe spoke about which used to take cyclists across the Dartford Tunnel. We say bring it back!

If you liked this episode, please remember to leave us a review, comment and make sure to share with your cycling friends!
